```{r}
# import libraries
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
df <- data.frame(x = 0, y = 0)

n <- 500

for (i in 2:n) {
  df[i, 1] <- df[i - 1, 1] + ((0.98)^i) * cos(i)
  df[i, 2] <- df[i - 1, 2] + ((0.98)^i) * sin(i)
}

ggplot2::ggplot(df, aes(x, y)) +
  geom_polygon()+
  theme_void()
```
